developer._instruction: If necessary, add one or several developers (person or organization) that contributed to the code implementation of this validation test version. Note that these developers will overwrite the ones provided in the validation test this version belongs to.

digitalIdentifier._instruction: Add the globally unique and persistent digital identifier of this research product version.

format._instruction: Add the used content type of this validation test version.

isAlternativeVersionOf._instruction: Add all validation test versions that can be used alternatively to this one.

isNewVersionOf._instruction: Add the validation test version preceding this one.

license._instruction: Add at least one license for this validation test version.

referenceData._instruction: Add the data that define the expected output of this test.

entryPoint._instruction: Add the entry point for this test, for example the Python class name for a SciUnit test.
